title: League crashing in champ select
body: This has happened to me twice this week, the second time today while selecting a champ for a RANKED game. I now have -3 lp and a leave buster i am not thrilled with. How do I get league to stop crashing or at least to not crash at such an inconvenient time?

replies.body: well same thing happens to me.. when i played ranked games twice it happen.. and i lost points the first is 3 the second time i lost 10 ...
I need some more details about what you mean by crash?  Do you get any error messages, and what does it say?   Is it as soon as you enter champion select?  Anything could help!

It said something along the lines of "League of legends has stopped working  click here to close the program you will be notified when a solution has been found" and gave me only the option of closing it. I was wrong in my previous thought of having a leave buster the second time it seems, but i did get -3 LP for it.  I was talking in chat, had yet to choose my champion, i had just banned kat i believe and then the popup appeared. the time before , the same thing happened, i was about to click on my page that time to check my mastery sets but then it crashed and that time was a normal game, so i got a leave buster. That's all i can recall.

Thanks for this detailed information!  It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a connection, and kicking you out.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to strengthen up your connection and stay in-game.  Let me know if you notice that this is specifically happening when trying to change your masteries,  That should help!
